column4: RPT-Wall St Week Ahead-Wall Street's tech love affair might end in tears
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  March 16 Outsized returns delivered by Amazon.com  Netflix and other heavyweight technology stocks have made them heroes on Wall Street  but some strategists warn that investors' reliance on them exacerbates the risk of a steep downturn.

column4: Facebook critics want regulation  investigation after data misuse
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Facebook Inc faced new calls for regulation from within U.S. Congress and was hit with questions about personal data safeguards on Saturday after reports a political consultant gained inappropriate access to 50 million users' data starting in 2014.

column4: Baidu video streaming unit iQiyi launches $2.4 bln U.S. IPO
column5: March 18 Chinese video streaming service provider iQiyi Inc  a unit of search engine giant Baidu Inc   has launched an initial public offering in New York worth up to $2.4 billion  seeking to expand its range of content.

column4: CACI seeks to break up General Dynamics' acquisition of CSRA: sources
column5: U.S. defense contractor CACI International Inc  has offered to merge with larger peer CSRA Inc   seeking to disrupt the latter's $6.8 billion acquisition by General Dynamics Corp   people familiar with the matter said.

column4: 'Black Panther' Surpasses 'Tomb Raider' for Fifth Box Office Crown
column5: LOS ANGELES  (Variety.com) - Disney-Marvel's "Black Panther" has maintained its momentum at the domestic box office  winning its fifth consecutive weekend with $27 million from 3 834 locations.

column4: 'Black Panther' Surpasses 'Tomb Raider' for Fifth Box Office Crown
column5: LOS ANGELES  March 18  (Variety.com) - Disney-Marvel's "Black Panther" has maintained its momentum at the domestic box office  winning its fifth consecutive weekend with $27 million from 3 834 locations.
